landingBenefit1Text: Consensus means solutions work for everyone, not just the majority.
landingBenefit2Text: No fixed options. Anyone can propose and refine ideas until we find what works.
landingBenefit3Text: The winning idea is the one that brings people together, not divides them.
landingBenefit4Text: Watch as consensus emerges. See how your input shapes the outcome.
landingCtaSubtitle: Join thousands of people creating solutions together
landingHeroSubtitle: Build real consensus, not 51% majorities. Everyone's voice shapes the solution.
landingInstitute: From the Institute for Deliberative Democracy
landingProblem1Text: Someone always loses. Half the population left unhappy.
landingProblem2Text: Someone else decides what you can choose between.
landingProblem3Text: Polarization wins votes. Unity doesn't get attention.
landingProblemSummary: Traditional voting creates winners and losers. We can do better.
landingQuote: We don't choose between existing options - we create better ones together.
landingStep1Text: Rate proposals on a spectrum from -1 (strongly disagree) to +1 (strongly agree). Your nuanced opinion matters.
landingStep2Text: Anyone can propose solutions. The best ideas rise based on collective consensus.
landingStep3Text: Real-time results show which ideas bring people together, not apart.
landingTerms: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service

surveyDescription: In this survey, you're participating in an innovative system that lets everyone truly make an impact – not just choose, but shape and rate ideas. The system combines research, statistics, and AI to identify broad consensus while preserving minority voices. Your participation here directly contributes to an accurate and meaningful picture of what truly matters.

We have taken the following measures to: We have taken the following measures to ensure accessibility:
We strive to conform to the Web Content: We strive to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards and the Israeli Standard IS 5568 for web accessibility.
We value your independent thinking. Shar: We value your independent thinking. Share your perspective before seeing others' ideas to help generate more diverse and creative solutions.
We welcome your feedback on the accessib: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of WizCol-Sign. Please let us know if you encounter any accessibility barriers:
We'll help you find similar ideas from t: We'll help you find similar ideas from the community
What you can do in WizCol: What you can do in WizCol
When an option exceeds the maximum, it w: When an option exceeds the maximum, it will be split into smaller rooms

When enabled, all participants will see: When enabled, all participants will see the survey in the default language regardless of their browser settings
When enabled, all viewers will see the d: When enabled, all viewers will see the document in the default language regardless of their browser settings
When enabled, suggestions that reach the: When enabled, suggestions that reach the review threshold will appear in the queue for admin approval
When enabled, users must watch the video: When enabled, users must watch the video before they can view the document
When should users complete the survey?: When should users complete the survey?
When splitting, rooms will be composed f: When splitting, rooms will be composed for maximum demographic diversity
While we strive for full accessibility,: While we strive for full accessibility, some third-party content or features may have limitations. We are working to address these issues.
will appear in the review queue: will appear in the review queue
WizCol-Sign is committed to ensuring dig: WizCol-Sign is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.
